torso.transformationDescription:
[npc.she] [npc.verb(notice)] [npc.her] skin has started to feel abnormally smooth and supple making [npc.her] look more attractive and easy on the eyes but while focusing on this change [npc.she] fales to notice her skin changing hue.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldHyena(spitbug)], [npc.skinFullDescription].
